item.title: Loading .CFG files
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Is this all I need?

package org.hyperion.rs2.model;

import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.FileReader;
import java.io.IOException;

/**
 * Weapon animations loaded via cfg.
 * 
 * @author Arham 4
 * 
 */
public class WeaponAnimations {

	public boolean loadWeaponAnimations() {
		String line = "";
		String weaponId = "";
		String attackAnim = "";
		String defenceAnim = "";
		String wholeLine = "";
		String[] linesAllowed = new String[4];
		boolean endOfFile = false;
		BufferedReader animFile = null;
		try {
			animFile = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(
					"./data/weaponanims.cfg"));
		} catch (final IOException ioexception) {
			System.out.println("weaponanims.cfg: error loading file.");
			return false;
		}
		try {
			line = animFile.readLine();
		} catch (final IOException ioexception) {
			System.out.println("weaponanims.cfg: error loading file.");
			return false;
		}
		while ((endOfFile == false) && (line != null)) {
			line = line.trim();
			final int spot = line.indexOf("=");
			if (spot > -1) {
				weaponId = line.substring(0, spot);
				weaponId = weaponId.trim();
				attackAnim = line.substring(spot + 1);
				attackAnim = attackAnim.trim();
				defenceAnim = line.substring(spot + 2);
				defenceAnim = defenceAnim.trim();
				wholeLine = wholeLine.replaceAll("\t\t", "\t");
				wholeLine = wholeLine.replaceAll("\t\t", "\t");
				wholeLine = wholeLine.replaceAll("\t\t", "\t");
				wholeLine = wholeLine.replaceAll("\t\t", "\t");
				wholeLine = wholeLine.replaceAll("\t\t", "\t");
				linesAllowed = wholeLine.split("\t");
			} else if (line.equals("[ENDOFANIMLIST]"))
				try {
					animFile.close();
				} catch (final IOException ioexception) {
				}
			try {
				line = animFile.readLine();
			} catch (final IOException ioexception1) {
				endOfFile = true;
			}
		}
		try {
			animFile.close();
		} catch (final IOException ioexception) {
		}
		return false;
	}

}
